snippet: The attack along the border with Afghanistan was the deadliest so far in the campaign for next Saturday’s national election.
abstract: Taliban bomb explodes at crowded political rally in Pakistan’s Kurram tribal region, killing at least 20 people and wounding 45 in deadliest attack so far of the campaign for country's upcoming national election.

byline.original: By DECLAN WALSH and ISMAIL KHAN
byline.contributor: Declan Walsh reported from Islamabad, and Ismail Khan from Peshawar, Pakistan.

lead_paragraph: The attack along the border with Afghanistan was the deadliest so far in the campaign for next Saturday’s national election.

headline.seo: Taliban Bomb Kills at Least 20 at a Pakistan Political Rally
headline.main: Taliban Bomb Kills at Least 20 at a Pakistan Political Rally
headline.print_headline: Taliban Bomb Kills at Least 20 At a Pakistan Political Rally
